io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.authorization.request

Class DefaultOpenIdAuthorizationRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.endpoint.authorization.request.DefaultOpenIdAuthorizationRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationRequest, OpenIdAuthorizationRequest

    @Prototype
 @Requires(configuration="io.micronaut.security.token.jwt")
public class DefaultOpenIdAuthorizationRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpenIdAuthorizationRequest
    The default OpenIdAuthorizationRequest implementation.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo

      • getIdTokenHint

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getIdTokenHint()
        Specified by:
        getIdTokenHint in interface OpenIdAuthorizationRequest
        Returns:
        Token previously issued by the Authorization Server being passed as a hint about the End-User's current or past authenticated session with the Client. If the End-User identified by the ID Token is logged in or is logged in by the request, then the Authorization Server returns a positive response; otherwise, it SHOULD return an error, such as login_required.

      • getLoginHint

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getLoginHint()
        Specified by:
        getLoginHint in interface OpenIdAuthorizationRequest
        Returns:
        Hint to the Authorization Server about the login identifier the End-User might use to log in.
